title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done

sources.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done | Full Drama Thriller Movie | Michael Shannon
sources.description:
Brad has committed murder and barricaded himself inside his house. With the help of his friends and neighbours, the cops piece together the strange tale of how this nice young man arrived at such a dark place.  A Werner Herzog film
2009.  Stars: Michael Shannon, Willem Dafoe, Chloë Sevigny, Udo Kier, Michael Peña, Brad Dourif

metadata.Plot: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.
metadata.Actors: Michael Shannon, Willem Dafoe, Chloë Sevigny
